patthana10.4:1.1: Nakusalaṃ naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ naasaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana10.4:2.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana10.4:4.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana10.4:6.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana10.4:10.1: Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
patthana10.4:14.1: Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana10.4:16.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana10.4:17.1: Nakusalaṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ nanakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana10.4:18.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
